bug.short_desc: Use fedora logo in menu applet

long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 1079809 use fedora infinity logo in cinnamon menu applet
Hello,
I wonder if its possible to set the default menu applet logo in cinnamon to use the fedora infinity logo included in fedora-logos. I think this would add a nice touch to the default cinnamon desktop.
Please see attached patch which changes the default cinnamon settings.
thanks
phil

This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 24 development cycle. Changing version to '24'.
More information and reason for this action is here: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_Program_Management/HouseKeeping/Fedora24#Rawhide_Rebase
